mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie(mno, title, director, actor, plot, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size2, release, price, passwd) VALUES(movie_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{plot}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size2}, #{release}, #{price}, #{passwd})
mapper.select: SELECT mno, title, director, actor, plot, word, file1,file1saved, thumb1, size2, release, price, passwd FROM movie ORDER BY mno ASC
